item.title: Terraform part 1
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description:
Terraform is an infrastructure as code (IaC) tool which help you to automate the deployment of your infrastructure into multiple providers supported by Terraform.

Unlike the others IaC tools (Azure ARM or AWS CloudFormation,…), Terraform is cloud agnostics. It means that you can use Terraform to deploy your infrastructure into multiple cloud providers.
